A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a Star Wars fan my entire life. Love them all. But this is not a good movie. Totally blew any chance of being a great movie. It was a real disappointment. You have to see it for yourself\, but so much of this was pointless and didn't accomplish anything. SPOILER: \nTo make a person that couldn't defeat an untrained Jedi into Supreme Leader is beyond the pale. Ridiculous at best.
